title: Friend hacked, how do i submit a request for them?

replies.body:
You'll want to have your friend submit a ticket with [**this specific form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to ensure their ticket goes to the right team and that the recovery process is done properly.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
im having the same problem too and its hard convincing riot that i own that account ;-; really hope that i can somehow show them that it is mine becuase ive had the account for so long
You can submit a ticket to Riot on the following site: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
